      • convert

        public <T> T convert(java.lang.Object object,
                     java.lang.Class<T> instanceClass,
                     java.lang.String... path)
        Description copied from interface: JsonHelper
        It converts a object (for example a native json object or a map) into another type (like a statically type DTO).

        This is usefull to convert opan api "anyOf" objects into a defined DTO.

        Specified by:
        convert in interface JsonHelper
        Type Parameters:
        T - he type of the converted object
        Parameters:
        object - the json object (like a json native object or a map)
        instanceClass - the class of the converted object
        path - the path
        Returns:

      • getInteger

        public java.lang.Integer getInteger(java.lang.Object object,
                                    java.lang.String... path)
        Description copied from interface: JsonHelper
        This method retrieves a Integer attribute following the the provided path

        for example:

        object = { "someAttribute1": {"someAttribute2": {"aNumber": 10} } }

        getInteger(object,"someAttribute1","someAttribute2","aNumber") will return 10

        Specified by:
        getInteger in interface JsonHelper
        Parameters:
        object - the object
        path - the path
        Returns:
